member.name: T:Game.NavmeshAgent
member.summary: NavmeshAgent is a script/component that allows to set the destination and calculation of a path of an AI agent inside a Navmesh

member.name: M:Game.NavmeshAgent.MoveAlongPath
member.summary:
Moves Actor along path.
Returns true if agent is moving, and false if there is no path or if the agent has reached its destination
